name: Quiz app
desc: Online Quiz Application is a user-friendly web-based platform for taking quizzes. Users can select quizzes, answer questions, and view their scores easily.

name: Weather Dekho
desc: A ReactJS weather app offering real-time weather information, including temperature, conditions, and forecasts, with a seamless user interface.

name: Blog Horizon
desc: Built a MERN stack blog website with responsive interfaces, state management, user authentication, CRUD operations, real-time updates and enhanced performance.

name: CURE MATE (Doctor Appointment Booking)
desc: Developed a full-stack Doctor Appointment Booking system with dual frontends (user and admin), secure authentication with access and refresh tokens, multiple JSON web tokens, REST API integration, and a scalable architecture, enhancing booking efficiency and user/admin experience.

name: Stack OverFlow Clone
desc: The project is a MERN Stack web application that provides a platform for users to ask, resolve, and share queries. Users can sign up, log in, post questions, and answer others' queries
